'''1.6.4 Build 5''' is the fifth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.6.4, released in October 2013. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.6.4]].

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[MinecraftEdu Launcher|Launcher]]'''
* Mute all students & Freeze all students buttons back to Player Settings menu.
* Added a lot of hidden settings to {{cd|launchersettings.ini}} that can be used to hide certain components from launcher starting screen:
** <code>disable-launcher-top-menu=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-top-menu-file=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-top-menu-open=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-top-menu-settings=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-top-menu-change-language=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-minecraftedu-button=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-minecraft-button=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-minecraft-custom-button=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-servertool-button=true</code>
** <code>disable-launcher-updates-button=true</code>

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Custom skins not rendering to other players.
* Netherrack on fire trying to spread if fire/tnt was disabled.
* When starting mcedu / mc in offline mode, it now checks if the corresponding jar file is not found, not that both mc & mcedu jar files are not found.
